title.narrative: Strengthening the Resilience of Multiple-use Protected Areas to Deliver Multiple Global Environmental Benefits

description.narrative: 1. Strengthened capacity and financial sustainability of the multiple-use protected areas (MUPAs) in dry forest and humid, semi-humid, and cloud forest landscapes of western and north-central Nicaragua, 2. Multiple global environmental benefits generated through sustainable forest and land management outside MUPAs,Project Management Cost

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Environment and Natural Resources (MARENA)
